TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit PhoneDialer extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Open the platform phone dialer to place a call.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Open(string number) cil managed

Docs.param: Phone number to initialize the dialer with. Example 15555555555
Docs.summary: Open the phone dialer to a specific phone number.
Docs.remarks:
Throws ArgumentNullException if number is not valid.
Throws FeatureNotSupportedException if placing phone call is not supported on the device.
